title: nI pAda pankajamu
sahitya:
nI pAda pankajamu nammitini nIvADanE nammi brOvumammA


anupallavi

  kApADuyani ninnE entO vEDitini krpAnga tanayE kartana vinavammA


caraNam    bhAmini parashiva kAmini parama pAlini nAdAnta kArtini jyOtini
nIdayakAmala cinmayi santatam Adi shakti rAjapUjita mAtangi
